# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined

set(BULLET_ROOT /usr)
#Find_Package(Bullet REQUIRED)

include_directories(
	${BULLET_INCLUDE_DIRS}
	${FMOD_INCLUDE_DIR}
	../../3rdparty/tinyxml
	..
)

	libbase.a
	${ALL_FILES}
)
target_link_libraries(
    libbase.a
    Bullet
)
